entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of drizzle. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 then northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
